trends: There have been 3 other sightings in Discovery Bay
There were no other sightings in Discovery Bay on or around August 21st 2011
This sighting has been favorited 1 time.
Summary: Two sets of 3 triangle lights of a halogen blue-whte color that trailed each other turning in an arcing motion then seperated, one dissapeared then the other disappeared . they were at about the height at which a large airplane flies.
divs: sighting detailsi was returning from fishing in the discovery bay, ca area and received a call from my cousing at 8:34 pm. i was driving my truck when my cousing who was also driving called on the cell phone and told me to look at the sky to the north. i looked at the sky and was stunned because of the unusual shapes, brightness and speed of the lights in the sky. i pulled the truck over and stopped to get a better look. i took out my phone too get pictures. i took several pictures but the resolution was poor and i was not satisfied with the shots. we observed two sets of three triangle shaped lights that were in the shape of a triangle for 2 1\2 minutes before one group of three seperated and disappeared , then the other group of three followed and dissappeared. i have never witnessed anything like this before and decided to call 911. i gave them my report. i called my famliy to tell them what i saw because i was so impacted and excited about what i witnessed.
